pr_title: fix bug in AddEmptyLists where lub sort cannot be determined

timeline.message: fix bug in AddEmptyLists where lub sort cannot be determined
expected sort of KSequence is K on rhs

fix case when parametric production appears on rhs under KSequence

Another issue with sort inference that was discovered when we started
filtering by the expected sort when computing the LUB sort was that we
were not setting the correct expected sort for children of KSequence
on the RHS. On the lhs, KSequence children have an expected sort of
KItem because they have to match on a cons list, however, because of the
cons list append operation, children on the rhs can be of sort K. This
was causing an error where we filtered out all possible sorts and were
unable to assign a sort to parametric productions that appeared under a
KSequence on the RHS. Now we correctly assign sort K in these cases.

timeline.bodyText: I guess the rewrite sort here is IntPtr?
timeline.author: radumereuta
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+module TEST
+  imports DOMAINS
+
+  syntax IntPtr ::= PtrValue
+  syntax PtrValue ::= SymLoc
+  syntax SymLoc
+  syntax IntPtr ::= EncodedPtr
+  syntax BitValue ::= EncodedPtr
+  syntax Encodable ::= PtrValue
+  syntax BitValueOrEncodable ::= BitValue | Encodable
+
+  syntax EncodedPtr ::= encodedPtr(PtrValue)
+  syntax Bool ::= sameBase(IntPtr, IntPtr) [function]
+  rule sameBase(_, (encodedPtr(S:SymLoc) => S))

timeline.bodyText: The name of this function looks funny to me. Could you at least add some documentation?
timeline.author: radumereuta
